Name: Isis with Harpocrates
Description: The goddess Isis is shown here in her classic role as a breastfeeding mother. She is seated on a throne, now lost, and holding the child Horus on her lap with her left hand. With the right she is holding her naked breast. She is wearing a close-fitting dress, a striated wig with vulture cap, uraeus on the forehead, kalathos and bovine horns with sun disc.
